name: Notion Trip Planner
description: Perfectly plan your upcoming trips with the Trip Planner Notion template.Do you find it challenging to plan your upcoming trips and create a well-defined itinerary?The Trip Planner is what you are looking for! Use this template to effectively plan your trips and embark on your travels with peace of mind.Plan your upcoming trips and create your dream itinerary.Create trips effortlessly by using the convenient "New Trip" button and organize them by continents. Define the places you wish to visit w
features: a space to plan your upcoming trips and define your itinerary; a space to organize your trips by continents; + a free guide to fully catch the template features
